verbs.description: WASHINGTON — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: paid] [ARG1: tribute] [ARG2: to Southport Police Lieutenant Aaron Allan] [ARGM-TMP: during the 37th Annual National Peace Officers’ Memorial service] . [ARGM-TMP: During his speech] , the President referred to Allan as “ special ” and assured Allan ’s wife and children that they had the support and love of the country .
